author: 123MrBrick
title: Best TRU Mini Build Yet.
review:
This is a fantastic TRU build. It has a function and looks great.

Box/Instructions

You got the pieces for this set from a table and put them in a zip lock bag. The instructions were a simple double sided piece of paper.

Parts

62 pieces. Nothing special. One sticker.

Minifigures

N/A

The build

The build is very simple and not lengthy. I completed it in 2 or 3 minutes with no trouble.

The completed model

The finished product looks great. It has a working gate and cool torches and bushes.

Overall opinion

I put 2 stars for playability because there is none besides the gate.

I put 5 stars for value for money because this was free.

I put 3 stars for parts because 62 pieces for free is good, even if said pieces aren't anything special.

I put 2 stars for the building experience because it was very basic, but still fun.

I put 5 stars overall because I absolutely love the finished model.
